title: U.S. - average salary for graduates , by discipline 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average salary in U.S. dollars for 4 number of Disciplines.
Discipline Computer Science has the highest Average salary in U.S. dollars and Business has the lowest Average salary in U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 4596.0 between the maximum Discipline Computer Science and minimum Discipline Business.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Discipline in the x axis and Average salary in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Average salary in U.S. dollars 79793.0 is found at Discipline Computer Science and the minimum is found at Business where Discipline is 75197.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average salary in U.S. dollars for 4 number of Disciplines.
Discipline Computer Science has the highest Average salary in U.S. dollars and Business has the lowest Average salary in U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 4596.0 between the maximum Discipline Computer Science and minimum Discipline Business.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Discipline, and Average salary in U.S. dollars in each Discipline on the y axis.
Discipline Computer Science has the highest Average salary in U.S. dollars and Business has the lowest Average salary in U.S. dollars.
The second highest Average salary in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Discipline Math & Sciences.
The highest Discipline Computer Science has 4596.0 more Average salary in U.S. dollars than the lowest Discipline Business.
Discipline Computer Science is higher than any other Disciplines with value 79793.0, followed by Math & Sciences, and Engineering. Down to Discipline Business with the lowest value 75197.0.
The Discipline Computer Science tends to be 1.02 percent higher than average.
The Average salary in U.S. dollars is 312005.0 if we add up values of all Disciplines.
